statements: SELECT * FROM students
SELECT student_name, math_score FROM students WHERE grade_level = 10
SELECT student_name, grade_level, math_score FROM students WHERE math_score > 80 ORDER BY math_score DESC
SELECT student_name, grade_level, science_score FROM students WHERE science_score < 70 ORDER BY grade_level ASC
SELECT student_id, student_name, english_score FROM students WHERE english_score BETWEEN 60 AND 80
SELECT student_name, grade_level, math_score FROM students WHERE grade_level > 8 ORDER BY math_score DESC, student_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT student_name, english_score FROM students WHERE english_score > 80 ORDER BY student_name
SELECT * FROM students WHERE science_score < 70 ORDER BY grade_level ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT student_name, math_score, science_score FROM students WHERE math_score > 85 AND science_score < 75 ORDER BY grade_level DESC, student_name ASC
SELECT student_id, student_name, math_score, english_score FROM students WHERE grade_level = 10 ORDER BY student_id ASC
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students WHERE grade > 90;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT DISTINCT grade FROM students;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade BETWEEN 80 AND 90;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT student_name, subject, score FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id;
SELECT student_name, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE age > 20
SELECT course_name, teacher_id FROM courses ORDER BY course_name ASC
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level='Senior'
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) FROM grades GROUP BY student_id
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE grade_level = 'Senior';
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT course_name, department FROM courses ORDER BY department, course_id;

SELECT students.student_name, courses.course_name, grades.grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN courses ON grades.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE students.age < 20 AND courses.department = 'Science';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Classes ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT teacher_name FROM Teachers WHERE teacher_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, class_name FROM Students JOIN Classes ON Students.class_id = Classes.class_id;
SELECT * FROM Students JOIN Classes ON Students.class_id = Classes.class_id WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT student_name, subject, score FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.grade = Grades.score;
SELECT teacher_name, class_name, student_name FROM Teachers JOIN Classes ON Teachers.teacher_id = Classes.teacher_id JOIN Students ON Classes.class_id = Students.class_id;
SELECT * FROM Grades WHERE score BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT student_name, class_name, subject, score FROM Students JOIN Classes ON Students.class_id = Classes.class_id JOIN Grades ON Students.grade = Grades.score;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT course_name FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM Grades ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT enrollment_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollments WHERE enrollment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM Students WHERE grade_level = 12 ORDER BY age DESC

SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, c.course_name, e.enrollment_date FROM Students s JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN Courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id WHERE c.course_name = 'Mathematics'

SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, AVG(g.grade) AS average_grade FROM Students s JOIN Grades g ON s.student_id = g.student_id GROUP BY s.student_id HAVING average_grade > 80 ORDER BY average_grade DESC
SELECT c.course_name, COUNT(a.assessment_id) AS num_assessments FROM Courses c LEFT JOIN Assessments a ON c.course_id = a.course_id GROUP BY c.course_id ORDER BY num_assessments DESC
